about_the_game:
Peaceful daily life recovered from the end of the battle against Diadora.
However, new demonic threats and hidden remnants of the past are revealed.
Is it luck or bad luck waiting for Soma's party?

The DLC adds two heroes who can enjoy different battles from the new script.
Set up the DLC to connect to the last story of "WISH.".

Beautiful female characters with different charms! Feel yourself with Japanese full voice!
